actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Aging (Labor and Human Resources).

official_title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to assist older individuals to avoid falling and to prevent incorrect medication and adverse drug reactions.
short_title: Preventive Health Services for Older Americans Amendments of 1991

summary.text: Preventive Health Services for Older Americans Amendments of 1991 - Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to include as preventive health services: (1) educational programs on fall prevention; and (2) medication management screening and education to prevent incorrect medication and adverse drug reactions.

titles.title: Preventive Health Services for Older Americans Amendments of 1991
A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to assist older individuals to avoid falling and to prevent incorrect medication and adverse drug reactions.
